Increment or decrement this widget to change the camera angle.

The Camera Node is designed for displaying camera recordings. Therefore, it subscribes to the topic specified in the details and receives a sensor_msgs/Image message. It will then display the received Image in the Viz Tab.

The GPS node is designed for displaying the GPS position of the connected robot onto a map. Therefore, it subscribes to the topic specified in the details and receives a sensor_msgs/NavSatFix message. It will then display the received position onto the map visualized in the Viz Tab. The map starts center on the targeted location and moves with the icon location. You can zoom in and out by pinching 2 or more fingers together or apart. You can recenter the mpa by long pressing the map.
